repairedDockerfile:
FROM ubuntu:16.04 
MAINTAINER govuk-role-platform-accounts-members@digital.cabinet-office.gov.uk 

RUN apt-get update && \  
apt-get -y upgrade && \
 apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y \
build-essential \
ruby \
ruby-dev \
libsqlite3-dev \
curl \
&& gem install --no-ri --no-rdoc gemstash && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;

EXPOSE 9292 
HEALTHCHECK \--interval=15s --timeout=3s \  
CMD curl -f http://localhost:9292/ || exit 1 

CMD ["gemstash", "start", "--no-daemonize"]
